## Sum contrast 零和対比

::: columns

:::: pull-left

- 実験的介入treatmentの効果を，全ての群の平均との比較で検討
  - 実験群 vs 全体平均

--

- 例：様々なプライミング効果を，全体平均と比べる
    1. 音韻的プライミング
    2. 綴字プライミング
    3. プライミングなし（統制群）

--

  - 対比は次の2つ
      1. 音韻的プライミング vs 全体平均
      2. 綴字プライミング vs 全体平均

::::

:::: pull-right

```{r schema-sum-contrasts, echo = FALSE}
baseline <- demoData |>
  filter(priming == "control") |>
  dplyr::select(rt) |>
  pull()

label.y <- demoData |>
  filter(
    priming != "control"
  ) |>
  mutate(
    rt = rt + abs(diff.from.GM)/2,
    label = c(
      "paste(italic(β)[1], '= Grand Mean - control')",
      "paste(italic(β)[2], '= Grand Mean - control')"
    )
  )

demoData |>
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = priming,
      y = rt
    )
  ) +
  geom_col(
    fill = "grey"
  ) +
  #### grand mean as intercept
  geom_hline(
    yintercept = mean(demoData$rt),
    linetype = "dotted",
    colour = "red",
    size = 1
  ) +
  geom_label(
    aes(
      x = "control",
      y = mean(rt),
    ),
    parse = TRUE,
    label = "paste(italic(β)[0], '= Grand Mean')"
  ) +
  #### difference between grand mean and orthographic
  geom_segment(
    aes(
      x = "orthographic",
      y = mean(rt),
      xend = "orthographic",
      yend = demoData |>
        filter(priming == "orthographic") |>
        dplyr::select(rt) |>
        pull()
    ),
    arrow = arrow(
      length = unit(0.1, "inches"),
      ends = "both"
    ),
    colour = "red",
    size = 0.75
  ) +
  #### difference between grand mean and phonological
  geom_segment(
    aes(
      x = "phonological",
      y = mean(rt),
      xend = "phonological",
      yend = demoData |>
        filter(priming == "phonological") |>
        dplyr::select(rt) |>
        pull()
    ),
    arrow = arrow(
      length = unit(0.1, "inches"),
      ends = "both"
    ),
    colour = "red",
    size = 0.75
  ) +
  geom_label(
    data = label.y,
    aes(
      x = priming,
      y = rt,
      label = label
    ),
    parse = TRUE
  ) +
  labs(
    x = "Priming Type",
    y = "Reaction Time"
  )
```
